name: spellwriters
description: Spellwriters is a 1v1 roguelite deckbuilder about flinging spells around!
author: Spellwriters Team <hi@spellwritersgame.com>

scripts.start:localbuild: npm run build:copy && npm run build:replacebasehref && electron-forge start
scripts.build: npm run build:copy && npm run build:replacebasehref && npm run build:createicons
scripts.build:createicons: cpy ../src/assets/favicon/android-chrome-512x512.png --rename icon.png ./icons --flat && png2icons ./icons/icon.png icon -allp -hm -i && cpy ./icon.icns ./icons && cpy ./icon.ico ./icons && rimraf icon.icns && rimraf icon.ico
